author: James Martin
method: Put the rice, milk, caster sugar, coconut milk and cardamom pod into a small saucepan and cook gently for 10 minutes.  Stir in the cream and cook for another minute. To serve, pour into a bowl, sprinkle with brown sugar and l caramelise the top with a mini blowtorch. Mix the orange and mint leaves together and serve on the side.
ingredients: 250g/9oz jasmine rice, washed,  350ml/12fl oz full-fat milk,  2 tbsp caster sugar,  200ml/7fl oz coconut milk,  1 cardamom pod, lightly crushed,  1 tbsp double cream,  2 tsp soft brown sugar,  Â½ orange, peeled and finely chopped,  6 mint leaves, chopped
